help.p: extracts CSV table. First argument is filename. subsequent arguments are columns to extract. If none, default column headings are used.
extractsURLs from project to given file. The first argument is the file in CProject to extract to; the second (optional) is the word "shuffle", resulting in shuffled URLs
merges projects. The cTrees are aggregated; if CTrees have identical names then the contents are merged into a single resultant cTree. If there are common files then the original cTree is kept.
set type of metadata. Might also be inferred from CProject later
rename CTree directories. noHttp removes DOI-based prefix ("http_doi_dx")
